Placed in the best location of Rosario, in the heart of the city, facing the Plaza Montenegro, the Automovil Club Argentino and San Martin pedestrian street.Baron del 1000 was opened on January of 2011. It is a superior three star hotel with a personalized family care, counting with 52 rooms.Its strategic and privileged location allows our visitors to be just two blocks from Cordoba pedestrian street, four blocks from the Stock Exchange and Paseo del Siglo, and five blocks from the Monumento a la Bandera, the Cathedral and the Parana river.
We offer our guests the following services:

Smart magnetic card lock, Internet Access (Wifi), TV LCD 32', digital decoder HD (High Definition) all rooms, minibar, Individual safe box, desk and chair, split air conditioner, heating radiators with individual control, soummier pillow top, telephone, acoustic openings,private bathroom with hairdryer.
Digital decoder HD (High Definition) all rooms
1 Room comfort for people with disabilities, equipped according to current regulations
13 quadruple room equipped with a double bed + two single beds for up to 4 people. (Ideal for families)
10 triple rooms with one double bed + one single bed for up to three people.
8 Triple rooms with three single beds for up to three people.
10 double rooms with one double bed.
10 double rooms with two single beds.
